actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to permit the continuation of youth fares, to authorize reduced-rate transportation for the elderly, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes air carriers to grant reduced rate transportation, under the Federal Aviation Act, to individuals twenty-one or younger, adn sixty-five and older, on a space-available basis. Prohibits air carriers from reserving any seating capacity on any regularly scheduled flight without receipt of one-fourth the tariff for air transportation. Prohibits the refund of such deposit unless the reservation is cancelled more than twenty-four hours before the scheduled departure of the reserved flight. Prohibits air carriers from overbooking their flights.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to permit the continuation of youth fares, to authorize reduced-rate transportation for the elderly, and for other purposes.
